message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right person.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you offering the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $13,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this happen!
